Description: Rare 1988 USA Fender American Standard TelecasterThis is the first year that Fender made the American Standard Telecaster created after the pre-CBS era. The 1988 American Standard Telecaster was designed by senior R&D engineer George Blanda at the new production facility in Corona, CA. This new design consisted of the following enhancements.Weight: Guitar weights a comfortable 7.4 lbs.Neck: 9.5" Fretboard Radius 22 fretsFingerboard: Rosewood with very smooth and tight grainPickguards: I am including two (2) additional custom pick guards. A Black Guard and Cream Guard. The one on the guitar is traditional Fender off white. Bridge: Original Bridge Assembly Controls: Volume and Tone Control Body: Alder BodyFrets: 22 fret. Some signs of wear but with plenty of meat on the frets. (See Picture)Case: G&G Vintage Fender Telecaster case in great condition with a few scratches. It has a durable black tolex exterior with leather trim, a black padded plush interior, a large neck accessory pocket, and plenty of room for your guitar of course. cant beat G&G Cases. Neck Pickup: This is a custom Klein Mini Humbucker. Purchased for $150.00. This pickup has that Fender sparkle and keep your tone hum free.Bridge Pickup: This is a Seymour Duncan STK-T3b. Purchased for $79.00. This stack humbucker pickup sounds just like a vintage Telecaster pickup, but it's stacked to keep your tone hum-free. This instrument is in very nice condition for a 31-year old guitar. The body finish is in very nice condition with a couple of dings here and there. There are a couple of chips on the back (See pictures) that kind of give it a lite relic look. Other than that, the body and neck are very nice. This guitar comes with a G&G vintage case in excellent condition. This is an extremely resonant instrument and great sounding guitar, the string action is very smooth, and the tone is outstanding.Please ask all questions in advance so there is no confusion after the auction. I describe everything the best I can with pictures. This is my personal instrument and I'm not a dealer.Please read my 100% feedback since 2002 and bid with confidence.Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Alaska may incur a slightly hire fee.
Title: USA Vintage Fender American Telecaster - 1988
